= Tools Overview =

*GAAP* project consists of the following tools:
 * Java Finite State Machines (FSM) Framework consist of:
  # FSM meta-model (includes [simple] and [tree] FSM implementations);
  # transformer between XML FSM representation (see [AutomataXML]) and in-memory FSM model;
 * Java Genetic Algorithms Framework

 * [Ant]
